Instruction: Strain soaked coconut through cheesecloth, squeezing to extract all liquid, which should yield about 3 cups of coconut milk.

Combine cornstarch, sugar, nutmeg, and salt. Heat coconut milk until simmering and gradually whisk in the sugar mixture. Cook until thickened, stirring constantly. Remove from heat when very thick, then stir in vanilla. Pour into an 8x8-inch pan, cover with plastic wrap, and refrigerate until set.
